game_description: Livit Studio is an all-in-one STEM tool that helps students learn programming, game development,Virtual reality development, augmented reality development, electronics,Arduino and virtual robotics. We deliver the power of professional game engines into your hands with a simple, intuitive and education-focused STEM design tool. No coding or design skills required! If you can imagine it, you can create it.
review_1: the application is simple and is very creative and will be very helpful in schools
